TextBlock.Text: BASIL: The Powerfail protocol was a pice of hardware that could absorb the power of the whole SSPU in case of an emergency.
BASIL: Hence why I swapped it with a warp core from our vessel.
BASIL: ...I was too late. 22 minutes is the time it set in, and my friends turned into a heaping mess of blood an hour ago.
BASIL: I do not know what to do.
